That is pushing it Hottie, a shield is a shield, and as such can only 
take a certain amount of damage. So what if you want to bring this 
char back after the restart, and as such want him to live. It doesn't 
matter whether the char is alive or dead at the end, because if 
you're going to RP him after, it's a totally different character. You 
shouldn't be so concerned about losing your character, he's likely to 
take a beating/get destroyed/run away before this is done.

Things to note:
-Missiles explode right? Then they should have an impact force, and 
there is a strong possibility of Apocalypse being knocked out of the 
sky. 
-Also, if he's got a force field shield, then he's gotta be drawing 
power from somewhere, and his power isn't unlimited.

NOTE: I'm visiting relatives for a few days, and might/won't not be 
able to do much posting.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Hottie4u2have1@a... wrote:
> Apocalypse puts up his force field blocking the shots.
> Apocalypse:Stay out of this you stupid pests! I'm warning you! He 
then fires 
> at shrapnel again not concerning himself with the others he also 
tries to get 
> shrapnel with his whip.
